author: Max Graham, Max Graham
title: Because of the virus, protecting habitat and wildlife has become an issue that affects everyone
description: Everyone can see this is no longer about just protecting charismatic animals. This is about protecting the value of the global economy
content: The illegal trade in wildlife is the fourth biggest illicit business in the world, after narcotics, human trafficking, and arms. Run by international cartels, and worth more than $20 billion a year, it fuels corruption, exploits the worlds poorest and is ruin… [+4640 chars]
